message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, Bob. However, the value of this product to me is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $13,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but that's the maximum I can offer. Can we meet somewhere in between?
